title: Airport evacuated after passenger smokes e-cigarette in toilet
text:
Airport evacuated after passenger smokes e-cigarette in toilet Last updated 10:50, February 20 2017 REUTERS 
The departures hall of a London airport was evacuated after a passenger lit up in a bathroom stall. 
A UK airport was evacuated after a passenger lit up an e-cigarette in a bathroom stall, triggering the fire alarm. 
The entire departures hall at Stansted Airport in Essex was shut down on Friday as a result of the incident, causing chaos during the morning rush, the Evening Standard reported. 
Tom Orrell was among those forced to leave the building at around 6am with the "fire alarm blaring". Tom Orrell, Twitter 
Passengers were barred from entering the departures hall after the incident. 
He described the scene as "chaos", saying there was no crowd control or airport staff in sight.
